body: Hey everyone! I hope you enjoyed your day off Andrew!

To catch you up Andrew, I need you to deploy a fake door website for me. Same way you usually do it. I asked Brian and Morgan yesterday while you were out, but they haven't learned how to do this yet.
Gotcha. @Brian and @Morgan -- do either of you have access to our sandbox server?
I don't think I do either. Not too sure what that is.
It's one of our team's servers in our company's private cloud.

For Sophia's experiments, she uses Wix nowadays which handles nearly everything for us, but we just need to use the server to manually create the domain cert validation and create an activity report. It's a process that was put in place by the cybersecurity team to allow us to do things this way due to the nature of new venture work.
Hahaha I'm always the person that needs to break the rules!!!

I'll take care of this now for you @Sophia. And then @Brian and @Morgan let's get you two access and then I can go through this process with you for the future. I believe you just need a private cloud account in order to access any of our team's servers.
I just emailed you the details of the domain name and such.

@Brian can you reach out to Tom to create you a private cloud login so that you can access this server? And then @Morgan you'll just need to reach out to Renata for that, since the rule here is that it requires manager signoff.
Cool. Let me know once you guys have login access and then I'll do a demo with you.
